comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [http://tivibu.com.tr](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Ftivibu.com.tr)
### Comment
> i am using a tp link router and i entered your dns in to routers DHCP Server menu as primary and secondary dns to block ads. Up to 1 week ago it was working flawlessly but now its blocking also one of my apps on smart tv and android tv box which is tivibu go. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ttnet.tivibucep How can i solve this problem? This app is official tv streaming app and i cant use it if i disable dns

### [NSFW] Screenshots
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1</summary>

  [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ojclizp19zkc40g4gwc4c8k44wsswsscg8o4v21xyg.jpg?nc=1)
</details>
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled</summary>

  [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/b3c5yy35xe88ggo44w0wcw0gkkoggs8r5gcit1phtw.jpg?nc=1)
</details>

### System configuration

Information | Value
--- | ---
AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS
DNS setup: | Device or router settings
DNS server: | AdGuard DNS Default server
Browser: | Firefox
